QuestData.Title: You're Either With Us Or...
QuestData.Description: The assistance of the nearby village has now become a necessity, $p.$b$bWe will need to use the village to regroup and tend to our wounded.$b$bPerhaps the villagers will join our cause after seeing the brutality unleashed by the alliance.$b$bYou will act as envoy for the Horde. Ensure the cooperation of their leader. Do not disappoint me!
QuestData.LogDescription: Attempt to enlist the help of Mayor Honeydew in Honeydew Village.
